Uses of Class
org.ejvm.compilation.EjvmCompilationException

  • Packages that use EjvmCompilationException 
    Package Description
    org.ejvm.compilation
    The compilation package contains classes important for the compilation of eJVM programs, most notably the implementation of the eJVM compiler itself.

    • Uses of EjvmCompilationException in org.ejvm.compilation

      Methods in org.ejvm.compilation that throw EjvmCompilationException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void EjvmCompiler.compile(InputStream src, OutputStream out)
      Invoking this method will try to parse and compile the eJVM program available from src, with the compiled executable written to out.
